name: Inhibit
description:
• Hello everyone. We are a passionate game development team. As a small but mighty group, we've stepped into the enchanting world of gaming, and we're now here with our first game, "Inhibit." Inhibit offers a top-notch experience for gaming enthusiasts, and this is just the beginning. After Inhibit, we're working to bring you more thrilling games.

    We're here to develop projects filled with innovative ideas that will take you deep into the world of gaming. Please share your ideas, desires, and feedback with us because we get better with you.

    You can currently follow us on Instagram, Twitter, and YouTube. Very soon, as we grow, we'll also be introducing our Discord channel to you. Keep following us to join and be a part of a community that shares the latest developments, surprises, and experiences!
